entries.title: Locked Box
entries.line: I somehow made it inside an old looking building. I can see a wooden box, with what looks to be a combination lock securing the contents. I should look around. Is that a calendar above it?

entries.title: Appeared in a Long Candle-Lit Hallway
entries.line: How did I get here? How do these portals work? I can't see an end to this hallway.

entries.title: Locked in a Closed Room
entries.line: I turned around and before I knew it I'm being blocked by walls that I swear weren't there before. I need to get out! I should look around.

entries.title: Found a Tape
entries.line: I found a tape labeled "Interesting Refractions". Maybe I can listen to it using the Tape Player on the desk.

entries.title: Listened to Tape
entries.line: I played the "Interesting Refractions" tape. It seems to be somekind of a journal entry. It references a girl looking at a mirror. Is it the mirror in this room?

entries.title: Mirror Reacted to Stare
entries.line: I looked at the old mirror for a few seconds. It somehow... reacted! I swear, I can make out strange shapes in the glass. They weren't there before!

entries.title: Entered a Maintanance Room
entries.line: I managed to open the door, revealing some sort of maintenance room.

entries.title: Picked up an old coin
entries.line: I picked up what seems to be an old coin. I can't tell whether it's real or not. Maybe I should search for more.

entries.title: Found a set of Slots
entries.line: I found a set of slots. Maybe I can set the coins in them. But on what order though?

entries.title: A Gate Appeared
entries.line: After setting the coins into the correct slots, an ellipse - shaped gate materialized out of thin air! I can't see very far inside it, but it seems to shimmer and quiver in waves. Wonder where it leads.
